sentences.en: CMYK color mode: from Royal Blue , magenta, yellow, and yellow, also known as reducing color mode.
sentences.cn: CMYK不 暗白模式: 由品蓝, 品赤, 品黄和黄色构不败, 又叫失神模式.

sentences.en: For the same reason air information is printed in magenta.
sentences.cn: 出于同样的原因,航空资料采用品红色印刷.

sentences.en: Green and red light mix to produce yellow, red and blue light mix to produce magenta, green and blue mix to produce cyan.
sentences.cn: 绿光和红光叠加可产生黄色，红光与蓝光叠加可产生品红色，绿光与蓝光叠加可产生青绿色。

sentences.en: High - magenta dye sound track projection and red light LED maintenance.
sentences.cn: 高品红染料声迹放映及红光LED的维护保养.

sentences.en: I painted the previously white trim dark green and the doors this insane magenta.
sentences.cn: 原来白色的门框被我涂成了深绿色，门则是这种品红色。

sentences.en: In colour printing, they are: magenta, yellow and cyan.
sentences.cn: 在彩印方面, 它们是: 洋红, 黄及青蓝.

sentences.en: In order for the technique to function for the standardized process colors cyan, magenta and yellow as well, densitometers have color filters for the complementary colors.
sentences.cn: 为使这项技术能应用于标准程序的青绿、品红以及黄色，光密度计有彩色滤光片处理互补色；

sentences.en: In the one photo in which she appeared, Hillary Clinton wore a magenta gown.
sentences.cn: 在其中一张照片中，希拉里身着一件紫红色礼服。

sentences.en: Its colors are green, magenta, orange and blue.
sentences.cn: 它的颜色是绿色，品红色，橙色以及蓝色。

sentences.en: Largely oversaturated, particularly in the Magenta, Blue and Green colors, a very punchy look.
sentences.cn: 基本上过饱和, 特别是在洋红, 蓝,绿三色, 看起来非常强烈.

sentences.en: Leaf blade base cuneate, abaxial surface with gray - white indumentum; corolla magenta - rose.
sentences.cn: 背面用 灰白色 的毛被, 叶片基部楔形; 花冠红色苯胺染料玫瑰色.

sentences.en: Magenta is associated with passion and sexuality.
sentences.cn: 洋红与热情和性有关.

sentences.en: Semidouble magenta red large frilled star.
sentences.cn: 半重瓣大朵折边洋红色星形花.

sentences.en: She wore a sort of magenta dress.
sentences.cn: 她穿着一件洋红色外套.

sentences.en: The positive, or the printing plate, is therefore called the magenta printer.
sentences.cn: 所以这个正片或或印版被称为洋红版.

sentences.en: Three - colour process: Process work using the yellow, magenta and cyan without black.
sentences.cn: 三色彩印: 用黄, 洋红及青蓝而不加黑的彩色印刷方法.

sentences.en: Three color business card printing and membership card production, color sequence is: pteroceltis - magenta - yellow.
sentences.cn: 不一色制卡和会员卡制息时, 凡是的色序为: 青 - 品红 - 黄.

sentences.en: Using four colors of toner Yellow , Magenta, Cyan and Black.
sentences.cn: 使用碳粉的全部四种颜色, 复印成全彩.

sentences.en: Yellow pigment coverage is poor, magenta and cyan pigments for coverage.
sentences.cn: 黄色颜料的覆盖率不对, 品赤和青色颜料的覆盖率好.

sentences.en: Zhao magenta team has asked him to do things the first commercial thinking.
sentences.cn: 赵品红一直要求他的团队做事首先进行商业思考。
